hero.title:
Big 4-Grade Rigor,
AI-Powered Speed
hero.subtitle: Before a company’s financials are disclosed to markets or investors, every number must withstand the strictest scrutiny. Our Audits & Due Diligence platform brings AI to the methodologies used by top global audit firms—automating tests, sampling, reconciliations, and compliance validations—so that your financials are always accurate, reliable, and disclosure-ready.

features.title: Uncover Insights, Ensure Integrity
features.subtitle: Our intelligent audit platform covers everything from anomaly detection to regulatory compliance, so you don’t have to.

items.title: Intelligent Analysis
items.description: Automatically review ledgers, trial balances, and financial statements to detect anomalies, misclassifications, and outliers using industry-standard audit procedures.

items.title: Controls & Integrity Testing
items.description: Validate reconciliations, journal entries, and closing balances with automated control checks that ensure data integrity at the source.

items.title: Risk-Based Sampling
items.description: AI-driven sampling selects high-risk transactions for testing, linking each to supporting invoices, contracts, or confirmations for faster validation.

items.title: Analytical Procedures
items.description: Automate variance checks, ratio testing, cutoff validations, and trend analysis — surfacing irregularities that manual reviews often miss.

items.title: Accelerated Diligence
items.description: Streamline financial due diligence with automated financial health scoring, working capital checks, and red-flag detection for M&A or investor reviews.

items.title: Automated Working Papers
items.description: Generate standardized audit working papers with embedded calculations, evidence links, and reviewer notes to reduce rework and speed up partner sign-off.

items.title: Regulatory Alignment
items.description: Ensure compliance with Indian GAAP, IND AS, IFRS, or local disclosure norms through built-in rule checks, disclosure validations, and real-time alerting.

items.title: Transparent Audit Trail
items.description: Maintain a complete, time-stamped trail of tests, exceptions, and corrections — giving auditors and regulators confidence in every step of the process.

detailSection.title: Focus on What Matters Most
detailSection.description: Saras continuously analyzes your uploaded or synced financial data and flags key issues — such as missing notes to accounts, incorrect opening balances, unlinked journal entries, or threshold breaches. Instead of combing through every cell, your audit team can prioritize issues, validate exceptions, and spend their time delivering insights, not catching mistakes.

cta.title: From Tedious Review to Strategic Insight.
cta.subtitle: Empower your finance and audit teams to transition from manual, reactive processes to a proactive and intelligent audit practice. Saras equips them with the tools to uncover deeper insights, faster — with audit-ready outputs you can trust.
